mapper.insert: insert into pet_mark_comt( cont, writer, sno) values(#{content}, #{writer.no}, #{sharingmarketboard.no})
mapper.select: select comt.srno, comt.cont, comt.cdt, mem.mno as writer_no, mem.name as writer_name, mark.sno as sharingmarketboard_no from pet_mark_comt comt inner join pet_user mem on mem.mno = comt.writer inner join pet_mark mark on mark.sno = comt.sno order by comt.sno desc

select comt.srno, comt.cont, comt.cdt, mem.mno as writer_no, mem.name as writer_name, mark.sno as sharingmarketboard_no from pet_mark_comt comt inner join pet_user mem on mem.mno = comt.writer inner join pet_mark mark on mark.sno = comt.sno where mark.sno = #{no}

select comt.srno, comt.cont, comt.cdt, mem.mno as writer_no, mem.name as writer_name, mark.sno as sharingmarketboard_no from pet_mark_comt comt inner join pet_user mem on mem.mno = comt.writer inner join pet_mark mark on mark.sno = comt.sno where comt.srno = #{no}
